thread.title: Alec Baldwin poses for photos as wife Hilaria runs errands | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Alec Baldwin poses for photos as wife Hilaria runs errands | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Alec Baldwin poses for photos as wife Hilaria runs errands | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share At one point, he posed clasping the iron railings of a padlocked gate with both hands and staring through the bars. Photo shoot: Alec, 58, put his rugged good looks to use as he strolled along in a t-shirt and loose pants with a jacket slung over one shoulder while a cameraman took pictures Firm grip: At one point, he posed clasping the iron railings of a padlocked gate with both hands and staring through the bars Rugged look: The 30 Rock and SNL star wore his graying hair swept back from his forehead and he rocked a five o'clock shadow Meanwhile, Hilaria stepped out with baby Leo, 23 weeks. The tot was snug as a bug in a rug in a hooded long-sleeved romper as his mom clutched him closely to her. The 33-year-old was dressed in black leggings and ankle boots paired with a long knitted cardigan. She left her brunette hair loose and covered up with a pair of large sunglasses. Doting mom: Hilaria stepped out with baby Leo, 23 weeks. The tot was snug as a bug in a rug in a hooded long-sleeved romper as his mom clutched him closely to her Stylish: The 33-year-old was dressed in black leggings and ankle boots paired with a long knitted cardigan. She left her brunette hair loose and covered up with large sunglasses Alec and Hilaria wed in 2012 and have three children: baby Leo, son Rafael, one, and daughter Carmen, three. The 30 Rock star also shares daughter Ireland, 21, with his first wife Kim Basinger. The Baldwins reside in Manhattan and also have a home in The Hamptons. Messages: Alec paused for a break to check his phone Catching up: The actor was seen chatting away happily on his cell phone Share or comment on this article 98
